question: I'm 52.  I had a tubal at 35 and uterine ablasion about 5 years ago for heavy bleeding.  Over the past year, I have started bleeding again.  Sometimes for a month at a time.  I have severe right sided lower adominal pain.I am overweight, have thinning hair, Type 2 diabetes, depression, anxiety, and I have problems sleeping.  I haven't been to a doctor in a while because of financial reasons.  Does this sound like PCOS?
title: Could I have PCOS?
